Name: Listen to Animals' Words: Translation of Bird's Language
Description: You meet Xuanyin again. This time, she is trying to talk to a Gray Crested Gull...
QuestDesc: You meet Xuanyin again. This time, she is trying to talk to a Gray Crested Gull...

Conditions.PreQuestName: Listen to Animals' Words: Translation of Lizard's Language

Dialogues.Speaker: Xuanyin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Great to see you again, {PlayerName}.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xuanyin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Can you guess which animal translation module I brought this time?

Options.PlotLineKey: I picked up the call of the Gray Crested Gull from a distance.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xuanyin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Excellent hearing! Yes, it's the Bird Language Translation Module. The water areas around Jinzhou are a crucial route for the Gray Crested Gulls' migration. However, some stupid idiots often feed them...

Dialogues.Speaker: Rover
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hey, watch the language...

Dialogues.Speaker: Xuanyin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: My apologies. From my observations, due to the increasingly harsh environment, a small number of the Gray Crested Gulls have abandoned their instincts of migration and become resident birds.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xuanyin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The language of these resident birds has also evolved. In addition to communication among their kind, there are some calls directed at humans.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xuanyin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Perhaps they're attempting to communicate with humans. Let's collect some samples to find out.

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_undefined
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Xuanyin loads the Bird Language Translation Module onto your Pangu Terminal.

Dialogues.Speaker: Gray Crested Gull (Translation)
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Give! Me! Give! Me! Gimme, gimme, gimme!

Dialogues.Speaker: Xuanyin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Give you what?

Dialogues.Speaker: Xuanyin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I heard that the Gray Crested Gulls have a thing for human food, especially Star Flakes. Are they asking us for food?

Options.PlotLineKey: We'll know when we give them Star Flakes.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xuanyin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You're a hidden chef, aren't you? I'm counting on you this time too!

Dialogues.Speaker: Xuanyin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: By the way, the Gray Crested Gulls are infamous for their appetite for snatching food from others. If we have food in our hands, they should be rushing in to grab it.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xuanyin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Ah-choo. Sorry. I stayed up all night, trying to build good relations with them.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xuanyin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Ended up not only losing my food but also catching a cold. Haha.

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_undefined
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: A Gray Crested Gull grabs the Star Flakes from you by surprise and flies away, hovering above your head and mocking you.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xuanyin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Are they mocking us?

Dialogues.Speaker: Xuanyin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: According to the information I've looked up, aside from Star Flakes, other fried foods are also very appealing to them.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xuanyin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: As the Gray Crested Gulls enjoy stealing others' food, they are also known as "Pirate Gulls".

Dialogues.Speaker: Xuanyin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Yes. They are frequently spotted around "wharves" and places where potato fries are sold.

Dialogues.Speaker: Gray Crested Gull (Translation)
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Gimme! *garbled text*

Dialogues.Speaker: Xuanyin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Why is the module freezing? I'd better uninstall it for now. Seems like there is no storage on your Pangu Terminal.

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_undefined
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Xuanyin uninstalls the Bird Language Translation Module from your Pangu Terminal and transmits the related data back to her.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xuanyin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Ah-choo, ah-choo, I need to hurry back and warm myself up. See you next time.
